post.body: it's gotten sad and old. Sometimes it stops seeing my sim card. And I'll prob have to keep a bold long term for testing
I'll have it with me tomorrow :) and probably for the foreseeable future. I think I have to kiss my pearl goodbye
I has an unlocked chinese bold now. It has too many keys.
my shiny red deathtrap of tallness comes complete with two leftover pegs. perfect!
you seem to have a lot of experience with this, wink wink!
I have to figure out the liability first, though
this is only the beginning!
@ursamajr please, I'd expect nothing less!
haha srsly. But then I fell down several steps when I came to see this apt, so a stepstool is old news?
I will steal both you and Amy sometime for lame-o storytime. But first I must stop making field trips
for the record, I am refraining from cryptic tweets today, but the crypticness lurks in my ~*~soul~*~
sorta sick of having my motto in many things be "hurry up and wait"
I think the proper response is "'cause you don't have schooool!" you have to do a little wiggly dance while saying it though
I think you and Shar might be the only ones who got tix?
saw a man with an actual hook for a hand while carrying her groceries home. it had a latch, like a lobster clasp.
argh, I'd like my apartment back now plz
that is a tongue twister! And has surpassed mommadala on the awesome scale
it is tasty! It's right by my house... If you hate it, they make passionfruit margaritas too :)
now my mom is showing me my gramma's one-eyed snake ring! eep
my mom says hi to you, twitterverse, "even the people she doesn't know"
ooh the traditional christmas eve whopper! I missed out on that... for some reason...
but not as tasty as a cinnamon margarita cause those are frakkin goooooooood
I bet it was tastier than louisiana, if we're being honest
okay I admit it, it was really just a tortilla chip shaped like louisiana. A girl can dream!
ate louisiana.
I think probably what I need is a justification for the extra effort :-p
eyeliner?
this would give me an excuse to cut my hair and do awesome pincurls, right?
I thought the big decision was up to me eh?
shit! let me know if I can dispatch my mom and/or me to help with badness
should I be paying attention to this?
your family is hysterical. and I think it was self-defense. the fight or flight mechanism!
last time I kicked a guy in the balls, he never spoke to me again. good thing you're related?
is quite the promiscuous blackberry user.
hears it sleeting out there.
put a second coat of sealer on her awesome stepstool, just to make absolutely sure she'll fall off it.
tried to put on her cardigan as though it were a pullover. time to go home.
is already daydreaming about baking tomorrow night.
will be suffering mom-induced chronic lateness until Sunday, and apologizes for that.
fashioned the last of her ornament hooks out of hairpins.
